nodeList.loreText: Rahyeh's wrath can fall on anyone.
nodeList.nodeDescription: A bolt of holy fire descends from the sky directly on to a targeted enemy.

nodeList.altText: {Fissures} are summoned at Smite targets, dealing fire damage in an area to enemies who stand on it.
nodeList.description: {Fissure} deals damage in a larger area.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Fissure has [10%] increased area of effect per point.

node.description:
Smite causes a {Fissure} underneath the target, dealing fire damage to enemies who stand on it.

{Fissure} costs 10 mana, last 3 seconds and has a 0.5 second cooldown.

node.loreText: Rahyeh's wrath can fall on anyone.
node.nodeDescription: A bolt of holy fire descends from the sky directly on to a targeted enemy.

nodeList.altText: {Fissures} are created at Smite targets, dealing fire damage in an area to enemies who stand on it.
nodeList.description: {Fissure} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Fissure has [5%] increased damage per point

node.description:
Smite causes a {Fissure} underneath the target, dealing fire damage to enemies who stand on it.

{Fissure} costs 10 mana, last 3 seconds and has a 0.5 second cooldown.

nodeList.altText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node, then the highest threshold is used.
nodeList.description: {Fissure} instantly kills enemies that are below a health threshold (percentage of their maximum health).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Fissure instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold ([3%] of their maximum health per point).

node.loreText: Rahyeh's wrath can fall on anyone.
node.nodeDescription: A bolt of holy fire descends from the sky directly on to a targeted enemy.

nodeList.description: Smite hits knock enemies back.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Nearby enemies are pushed back [1]m per point.

node.altText:
Descends damage scales with modifiers to spell damage.
When you use Smite, Lunge and Shield Rush go on cooldown, and when you use one of those skills, Smite goes on cooldown.
node.description: You appear at Smite's targeted location, dealing physical damage to surrounding enemies. Smite costs more mana and has a cooldown.
node.nodeDescription:
+5 second cooldown and +5 mana cost

You appear at the target location dealing 20 physical damage to all nearby enemies.

node.loreText: Rahyeh's wrath can fall on anyone.
node.nodeDescription: A bolt of holy fire descends from the sky directly on to a targeted enemy.

node.description: You have increased attack and cast speed if you have hit an enemy with Smite recently (last 4 seconds).
You deal additional melee fire damage if you have hit an enemy with Smite recently (last 4 seconds).
node.nodeDescription: You deal +[5] melee fire damage per point if you have hit an enemy with smite recently.

node.description: Smite heals in a larger area.
node.nodeDescription: [25%] increased area of healing per point

node.loreText: Rahyeh's wrath can fall on anyone.
node.nodeDescription: A bolt of holy fire descends from the sky directly on to a targeted enemy.

node.description: Enemies killed by Smite have a chance to explode, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Slain enemies have a [20%] chance per point to explode dealing fire damage to nearby enemies.

node.altText: Spreading Flames deals 40 fire damage over 4 seconds and spreads between enemies.

node.nodeDescription: [10%] chance per point to apply spreading flames.

node.loreText: Rahyeh's wrath can fall on anyone.
node.nodeDescription: A bolt of holy fire descends from the sky directly on to a targeted enemy.

nodeList.altText: Blinded enemies have 50% less critical hit chance and are less accurate at range. Does not stack.

nodeList.nodeDescription: Smite has a [10%] chance to blind enemies hit.

node.loreText: Rahyeh's wrath can fall on anyone.
node.nodeDescription: A bolt of holy fire descends from the sky directly on to a targeted enemy.

nodeList.description: Smite hits have a chance to shock enemies, and shock inflicted by Smite is more effective.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
+[20%] chance to shock per point

[20%] increased shock effect per point

node.description: Smite hits also cast a {Lightning Bolt} at 3 nearby enemies, dealing lightning damage. Smite costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription:
+5 to mana cost.

When smite hits, you cast a lightning bolt at up to 3 nearby enemies.

node.altText:
Secondary effects like Fissure and Spreading Flames are unaffected.

Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
node.description:
Smite's base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

All ignite chance from this tree is converted to shock chance and effects related to ignite now depend on shock instead.
node.nodeDescription: Smite now deals lightning damage. Ignite chance is converted to shock chance and effects related to ignite are now related to shock.

node.altText: Blinded enemies have 50% less critical hit chance and are less accurate at range. Does not stack.
node.description: Smite has a chance to blind enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Smite has a [10%] chance to blind enemies hit.

nodeList.description: {Lightning Bolts} created by Smite hit additional enemies.
